title: Cannon Fodder Becomes a God of Cooking - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Chefs   Cold Love Interests   Cooking   Cute Story   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Level System   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Reincarnation   Restaurant   Second Chance   System Administrator
author: Come Seven Months   月七兮
description: Qin Xin realized that she was the female supporting character in a book only after her death. She was disturbed by the plot just to highlight the heroine’s uniqueness. After coming back to life, Qin Xin threw the plot, kicked the scumbag, went to a dream city, and opened up a world of gourmet food of her own.>
